snippet: The success of an economic overhaul could hinge on policy battles over land, money and a fiscal system that has bred public discontent and financial hazards.
abstract: Chinese Pres Xi Jinping's proposed economic overhaul includes expanding role of markets in energy and natural resources, encouraging private investment in finance and easing state controls on interest rates, but also focuses on rural farmland rights and taxation issues.

byline.contributor: Jonathan Ansfield contributed reporting from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: The success of an economic overhaul could hinge on policy battles over land, money and a fiscal system that has bred public discontent and financial hazards.

headline.main: Success of Chinese Leader’s Ambitious Economic Plan May Rest on Rural Regions
headline.print_headline: Success of Chinese Leader’s Ambitious Economic Plan May Rest on Rural Regions
